results.title: Metformin inhibits intracranial aneurysm formation and progression by regulating vascular smooth muscle cell phenotype switching via the AMPK/ACC pathway
results.text_hl: Thus, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ has therapeutic potential for the prevention of @<m>DISEASE_Intracranial_Aneurysm</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002532 @@@IA@@@.
